15:08 Monday 01 April 2019 HST The NWTA was held in Hawaiian Sanctuary, which featured lots of animals
Francois sitting on a dome covered in blankets
Francois sitting on bunches of apple bananas
From Bruce’s yard
Pics after 2018 lower Puna eruption riddled the area with lava flows

item.title: francois with cement
item.description:
15:30 Tuesday 10 April 2018 JST うちのと近くに新しいアパートが作られます。 New apartments are being built near our house. 今日、そこで写真を撮りました。 Today, I took pictures there.
三人はセメントを流し込みました。 Three people poured cement.
フランソワの写真を撮りました。 I took a picture of Francois. フランソワは写真を撮られました。 Francois had his picture taken.
ジオキャッシュが見つかりました。 The geocache was found. 09:46 Wednesday 11 April 2018 JST 私は生徒に違う時間にレッスンに来られた。 My students trickled in to class (interrupting the class each time). 生徒は私に「コラッ」と言われました。 My students got yelled at by me.

item.title: made pottery
item.description: 11:04 Saturday 19 August 2017 JST We just made some pottery with an chill old man sensei. I made a mobius strip for Fred, an upside-down plate for me, a dice shaker and two dice for my students.

item.title: pics from Mas third trip to Japan
Hung out with Lisa in July
item.description: 2017-07-16T00:11:31+09:00 (written 00:11 Friday 06 October 2017 JST) This is from when Lisa came over to our house (and stayed the night).

item.title: Going to Renee's in Gunma today
item.description: 07:53 Friday 14 July 2017 JST Leaving in 2 hours. 18:51 Friday 14 July 2017 JST Such a nice area! We went to a long cave thing that was apparently dug without modern equipment. It is 400 meters long, and was apparently supposed to go 400 meters more, but life and heavy rock got in the way. Really nice quiet energy there. Visited a 41.8 meter tall statue which is 10 meters taller than Corcovado in Rio.

item.title: hardlinks on DH
item.description: 12:03 Monday 10 July 2017 JST Neat. These two files are actually the same file with different names.

item.title: Great day at the beach
item.description: 20:58 Sunday 09 July 2017 JST I joined Lin who met her co-workers in Kamakura for a going away party for one of the managers. Aki had a Canon film camera with a short little lens, so I offered to give her the slightly longer lens that came with my Canon EOS.

item.title: Sent Francine to Sydney
item.description: 22:10 Friday 15 April 2016 JST Francine, Francois’ girlfriend, is headed to Sydney! I took some pics of them before sending her off.

item.title: At sushiro with Lin, Francois, and Lin's mom
item.description: ##17:39 Saturday 13 April 2013 17:34pm Saturday 13 April 2013 At 回転すし with Francois, Lin, and Lin’s mom.

item.title: Francois with Kan
item.description: 27 October 2012 (written 11:54 Monday 10 July 2017 JST) Thanks to Cathy for sending this picture! Thanks to (the concept of) Inbox Zero for uncovering the email!
